EmailTemplate.name: Australia Campaign 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn more about our extensive line of mobile hydraulic products!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Danfoss Power Solutions is a world-class provider of mobile hydraulics for construction, agriculture, material-handling and other off-highway vehicle markets, and we have some important information to share with you about our five major product lines:
Orbital Motors | Valves | Piston Pumps & Motors | Steering | Mobile Electronics
Learn how we are Engineering Tomorrow through development of products and systems for the mobile hydraulic markets. We would like to ask you to fill out the following form to begin receiving your electronic communications from Danfoss Power Solutions.
http://www2.powersolutions.danfoss.com/australia2015
Best regards, Danfoss Power Solutions
Danfoss Power Solutions (US) Company 2800 E. 13th Street Ames, IA 50010, USA
Danfoss Power Solutions ApS Nordborvej 81 DK-6430 Nordborg, Denmark
Danfoss Power Solutions GmbH & Co. OHG Krokamp 35 D-24539 Neumunster, Germany
Danfoss Power Solutions (Shanghai) Co. Ltd Building #22, No. 1000 Jin Hai Rd Jin Qiao, Pudong New District Shanghai, China 201206
